com.powerup.logic

Class Company

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.powerup.logic.Company
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Company>

    public final class Company
extends Object
implements Comparable<Company>
    An electricity company.

    Initially inactive, but is activated during the course of the game. Once activated, owns tiles and sells shares. Can take over other companies. Becomes inactivate again if taken over.

    Since:
    2014-01-22
    Author:
    Oliver Lewisohn

      • sellPrice

        public int sellPrice()
        Calculates the price of buying one share from the company.

        A company's value grows by 10 percentage points for each tile it owns in addition to the minimum of two tiles.

        Returns:
        The price of buying one share from the company.

      • sellShare

        public Share sellShare()
        Instructs the company to sell one of its shares, if it has any left.
        Returns:
        The share which is being sold.
